title: Cuba, U.S. Agree To Prisoner Release Including American Alan Gross
teaser: Signaling what could be a major shift in U.S. relations with Cuba, Gross, who has been jailed in Cuba for five years, will be released, while the U.S. will release three Cubans.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
